pages.text: Getting there's easy. Getting out is harder.$(p)There are three ways to get to the Midnight:$(li)Get abducted and be dragged there against your will!$(li)Voluntarily walk through a portal at night.$(li)Build a Rift Machine and come and go at your convenience.
Once you're in the Midnight, using a Rift Machine or finding a rift are your ways out.
